EmailTemplate.name: RE CO Steer Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Change in CO Steer {!RE_Route_Backbone__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
CO Steer for the product {!RE_Route_Backbone__c.RE_Product_Name__c} is {!RE_Route_Backbone__c.RE_CO_Steer__c} / {!RE_Route_Backbone__c.RE_MY_CO_Steer_Unit__c}. It is applicable for the location {!RE_Route_Backbone__c.RE_Destination_Name__c} and source {!RE_Route_Backbone__c.RE_Source_Name__c}.
Click on this link to check the detail - {!RE_Route_Backbone__c.Link}
Thanks, Revolution East Team
